about_the_game:
This game is like dimensions connecting with one another so you have a galactic space empire dimension, western dimension, fairy tail dimension, medieval dimension, Gods dimension, all making contact with one another.

This game is a soul born inspired action adventure RPG game. I want to make each character unique and flesh out their own story, background, personality then all of this will affect the character powers, type, talents, skills, fighting styles, and weapons. What's good about my game is the choices you make in the narrative greatly affect the outcome of the story of the game as well as the people in the game world around you. Multiple branching narratives that the player can explore and discover.

name: Dimensional Shift Awakening

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 5.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
